document_data.mainbody:
yana was a child of Fiona who lived in the Lower City of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Ayana died in the , and her body was buried in the Lower City Graveyard. Fiona, the childs mother, could not thank the mortician Valmorba enough for going above and beyond for the funeral in a letter and sent the Lower City Mortuary gold for the coffin and for Valmorba to bury the girls beloved teddy bear with her.
